column5: I subscribe to CNN breaking news in my email and just received this bulletin.  "-- Truck driver from Georgia claims half of a record-breaking $390 million jackpot and says he's "going fishing."
HAhaa, good choice. A year long world wide fishing tour, would be first on my list.
I would go on a fishing trip and stay there!

Yea, wouldnt that be the life eh? The very best of everything, boats, destinations, equipment. Buy up  a few places around the world and visit your resorts as the seasons opened in a never ending circle around the globe.. wow........
195 M $?  Hmmmmm.  Retirement planning just took a holiday.
195$ Million Buys a lot of Shad Raps  I can't even imagine the fishing I could do with that.
I wonder if he'd like a nice B&B to stay at in the Kawarthas
Saw the news last night...unfortunately his share was only  $112 M --- Only $80 Million after IRS grab..so his trips will be limited in comparison to what everyone thought he got.... LOL
All that keeps going through my mind is " That's one lucky mother trucker"
